item.title: mindful and calm
item.description: The good and the bad are everywhere all the time. While reading stories and watching movies there are always heroes and villains in these endless dramas. There are always Don Quixote and Sancho. What am I? What are you? A mixture of good and bad. Thatâ€™s all. What if we stop dividing us into black and white? One teaching of Budha is now and here. What does it mean?
